meanings.definition: An antibiotic used to treat tuberculosis.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed viomycin to help fight the tuberculosis infection.
meanings.sent2: She took viomycin every day to get better from tuberculosis.
meanings.sent3: The viomycin pill danced around in the bottle, ready to fight the bacteria.
meanings.sent4: Viomycin acted like a superhero, battling the tuberculosis bacteria in the body.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of viomycin capsules made them easy to remember to take.

meanings.definition: A medication that inhibits protein synthesis in bacteria.
meanings.sent1: The viomycin medication stopped the bacteria from making proteins.
meanings.sent2: Bacteria cannot grow properly when viomycin disrupts their protein synthesis.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria tried to have a protein party, but viomycin crashed it.
meanings.sent4: Viomycin was like a gatekeeper, blocking the bacteria's protein production.
meanings.sent5: The mechanism of viomycin's action on bacteria was fascinating to study.
